attributes.title: Daddy trump
attributes.review: I wanted to pay my respects to big Cheeto man but after opening this app I was embarrassed by how poorly it’s constructed and baby daddy trump it app is just not worth the space on my phone still holding it down for you tho

attributes.title: this app is AWFUL
attributes.review: i definitely do NOT recommend this app. when i first opened the app i was greeted with a photo of the cheeto man. that is very much something i would not like to see when i first open an app.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app does not do a good job of giving honest information to the public. They lie and try to manipulate those who get this app. People should not be subject to such distrust in an app. 1 star is the lowest but I wish I could do 0.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is horrific, if I could give it zero stars I would😐 it was impossible to use and I kept getting weird messages sent to me in Russian. 10/10 would never download again.

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: This is a horrible, no good, very bad app. This really bigoted guy is on there and I think he might be a moderator or something because he’s everywhere. He’s sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, misogynistic, and to top it off: a rapist. I don’t think I need to go on.

attributes.title: My cat caught on fire
attributes.review: I opened the app to see when the next rally was with my car next to me and when I showed him what I was doing he literally blew up. THE LIGHTS IN THE APP BLEW HIM UP. Now I have to pay for my cats funeral because of this developer’s wrecklessness. RIP Sprinkles 😔.

attributes.title: Horrible app 0/10😡🤮
attributes.review: When I first opened the app, it asked for my phone number like what😧i am not giving away my very personal info! Then i opened it and i saw the big fat cheeto🤢.like ew im not ever getting this app ever again❌❌

attributes.title: REMOVE
attributes.review: I opened the app to a picture of A CHEETO and everyone knows I’m terribly allergic!! Trigger warning much? Also there were so many glitches I couldn’t even read the screen! Horrible app and incredibly inappropriate🤮

attributes.title: The app is racist
attributes.review: When I opened the app, there was a picture of Donald trump asking for my phone number. I didn’t give it to him because our age gap is too huge 😔. He asked for my phone number without consent oof.

attributes.title: Why I hate this app and trump
attributes.review: First off when I opened it it said make America great but obviously it’s not because of trump and it took forever to load over all I hated it I hope you take this app off 😡🤮
